thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Seaspine Sees FY 2017 Revenue $132 Million To $132.2 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Seaspine Sees FY 2017 Revenue $132 Million To $132.2 Million
text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Seaspine Holdings Corp:
* SEASPINE ANNOUNCES PRELIMINARY RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $135 MILLION TO $139 MILLION * SEES FY 2017 REVENUE $132 MILLION TO $132.2 MILLION * SEES FY 2017 REVENUE UP ABOUT 2.5 PERCENT * FY2017 REVENUE VIEW $131.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q4 REVENUE IN RANGE OF $34.2 MILLION TO $34.4 MILLION, UP ABOUT 6 PERCENT
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $33.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
